hero.title: Meet the team
hero.sub: Over five decades of combined Silicon Valley experience in AI, startups, and venture capital.

john.name: John Whaley
john.title: Co-Founder & Managing Partner
john.intro: John Whaley is a serial entrepreneur and renowned expert in compilers, cybersecurity, and machine learning. He founded three cybersecurity companies—Moka5, UnifyID, and Redcoat AI—and created Inception Studio, a zero-equity accelerator for elite AI founders.

sections.title: Academic excellence
items: Stanford PhD, Arthur Samuel Best Doctoral Thesis Award
MIT B.S. and M.Eng. in EECS with a perfect 5.0 GPA
Adjunct Lecturer at Stanford (Compilers & Building with LLMs)
Best paper awards at PLDI, ISSTA, and OOPSLA
His work on compilers formed the basis of Chapter 12 of the "Dragon Book"

sections.title: Entrepreneurship
items: UnifyID: Behavioral biometrics authentication (acquired by Prove)
Multiple startup competition wins including SXSW, RSA, MIT AI Idol

sections.title: Inception Studio impact
sections.body: In 2022, John launched Inception Studio to give experienced founders the focused, zero-equity support they need. The community has now welcomed {{foundersParticipated}} founders who have started {{numberCompaniesRaised}} companies and raised over {{companiesTotalRaised}}, with trust built before any capital is deployed.

mike.name: Mike Morris
mike.title: Co-Founder & Managing Partner
mike.intro: Mike Morris is a 28-year Silicon Valley veteran with deep expertise in building world-class technical teams. Before co-founding Inception Studio and Redcoat AI, he helped grow multiple startups through acquisitions and an IPO.

sections.title: Career highlights
items: VMware: one of the first 80 employees, scaling from startup to 20,000-employee public company
NetCitadel: founding technical leader (acquired by Proofpoint)
Led engineering organizations through multiple acquisitions
Nearly three decades of leadership in enterprise software and cybersecurity

sections.title: Expertise
sections.body: Mike brings battle-tested operational experience—knowing how to build, scale, and integrate technical teams. His track record through multiple exits gives founders a clear blueprint for creating acquirable, defensible companies.

sections.title: Inception Studio
sections.body: As co-founder of Inception Studio, Mike shapes the retreat programs and community that attract elite technical founders. He focuses on identifying teams with the depth, execution, and resilience to win in AI-native markets.

cta.title: Ready to invest in the next generation of AI founders?
cta.subtitle: Join our limited allocation for Fund I. Minimum commitment $250K.
